title: It’s What’s on the Inside That Counts up to 1000 Episodes - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Academy   European Ambience   Magic   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Multiple POV   Royalty   Special Abilities   Transported to Another World
author: 翡
description:
The prince could see through the minds of others. On his first day of school, he found a classmate playing various stories inside her head every day in class.

From then on, a good prince embarked on a journey to pursue the girl (to watch shows together)

Lankershuli: Today I must finish watching Detective Conan!

Lina: You must be dreaming, I’m afraid!

Lankershuli: Father, this is my girlfriend. I must marry her!

Minister: This is just a commoner. Your Highness, please think twice!

The emperor (began to binge-watching shows): You marry right away!

One sentence introduction: the story of a foolish couple>
